Author: orthofuckyrself
Text: My friends all know me as that one weirdo who actually eats the veggie platter, and takes the leftovers of it home XD

Author: waitingdaisy
Text: I fucking lucked out this year, people brought tons of healthy options to my company holiday party. Pickled green tomato salad, cous cous salad, that cabbage salad with the raisins, a fruit and a veggie tray. Of course there were also 3 kinds a of Mac and cheese.... But what can you do.   I did splurge on 2 bites of sweet potato casserole. But I didn't get any dessert so I'm going to let the sweet potato casserole slide, even though it tasted like dessert. And there's always the worry that they could have thrown any ingredient in there, but imo that's less of a concern when the lady who brought it is skinny ðŸ˜‚
